sqlMap.select: select bm_num,bm_title,bm_content,bm_form,bm_start,bm_end,enrollment,reg_notice,cmp_notice,related_bns,bns_box,important,bm_state,emp_num, r from (select bm_num,bm_title,bm_content,bm_form,bm_start,bm_end,enrollment,reg_notice,cmp_notice,related_bns,bns_box,important,bm_state,emp_num, rownum r from business_manage where bm_num=#bm_num# order by bm_num desc) where rownum <= 1

select bm.bm_num,i.important2,bns.box_name,bm.bm_title,bm.bm_name,bm.bm_start,bm.bm_end,bs.bm_state bm_state2 from business_manage bm,important i,bns_box bns, bm_state bs where bm.important=i.imp_num and bm.bm_state=bs.state_num order by bm.bm_num desc

select bm.bm_num,i.important2,bns.box_name,bm.bm_title,bm.bm_name,bm.bm_start,bm.bm_end,bs.bm_state bm_state2 from business_manage bm,important i,bns_box bns, bm_state bs,bm_form bf where bm.important=i.imp_num and bm.bm_state=bs.state_num and bm.bns_box=bns.bns_num and bf.bmfo_num=bm.bm_form and bm.bm_form=1 order by bm.bm_num desc

select count(*) from business_manage bm,important i,bns_box bns, bm_state bs,bm_form bf where bm.important=i.imp_num and bm.bm_state=bs.state_num and bm.bns_box=bns.bns_num and bf.bmfo_num=bm.bm_form and bm.bm_form=1 order by bm.bm_num desc
select count(*) from business_manage
select e.emp_name from business_manage b, emp e where e.emp_num = b.emp_num
